data.why:
I have a script "storabledit.pl" which allows to edit files that
    were written with the Storable module. To my knowledge, there is no
    such script yet.

    Second, I'm thinking about publishing a Web Application Framework
    that I developed in the past 4 years.

    If possible, I'd prefer to have the ID "LOCHMATTER" (10 chars). I
    don't know how strict the rules about ID length are ...
